card_text: Apply these effects, in sequence, based on the number of face-up "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters with different names in your Extra Deck.$N●3+: "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters you control gain ATK equal to their own Pendulum Scale x 300 this turn.$N●5+: You can destroy 1 card your opponent controls, then if you have an odd Pendulum Scale in your Pendulum Zone, draw 1 card.$N●7+: You can Special Summon 1 "GranSolfachord" monster from your Extra Deck.$NYou can only activate 1 "Solfachord Symphony" per turn.
